page.title: 15Entertainment and Recreation
page.content: East Grinstead has its own museum which opened in 1976 at the old Town Council offices at East Court.It is open from 2_4pm every Wed. and Sat., admission is free.There is a wide range of sports facilities in E.G.The Kings Centre houses a swimming pool, gymnastics equipment and courts for team games.The E.G. Lawn Tennis & Squash Rackets Club with 400 members has its own clubhouse and grounds in Ship Street and was only the fourth such club to be founded in the country.The town has its own cricket, squash,football & hockey clubs.The E.G. Literary & Social Institute offers snooker, table tennis, cards and a social room with daily papers and a television for the use of members. For musicians the town offers the opportunity to play with either the Concert Band or the Sinfonia.
